text: Christina Onassis (December 11, 1950 â€“ November 19, 1988) was a Greek- Argentine businesswoman and socialite. She was the heiress to the Onassis family fortune. She was the only daughter of Aristotle Onassis, a wealthy shipping businessman, and Athina Livanos. Onassis was born at LeRoy Sanitarium in New York City, United States, but she gave up her American citizenship. She had a brother, Alexander Onassis. Her daughter, by Thierry Roussel, is Athina Onassis Roussel (named after Christina's mother). Christina died in Buenos Aires from a heart attack. She was aged 37. Her heart attack was caused by pulmonary edema. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:1988 deaths Category:People from Buenos Aires Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Deaths from pulmonary edema Category:Disease-related deaths in Argentina Category:Greek people
title: Christina Onassis
